title.en: The Heiress who has Fallen on Hard Times Becomes the Capable CEO’s Secretary -I Said I would Accept Any Punishment, but I Didn’t Know it’d be Fondling!

altTitles.ja: 落ちぶれお嬢様、敏腕社長の秘書になる～どんなバツでも受けるけど、こんな愛撫は聞いてない！

description.en: “That look... turns me on.” My body won’t stop reacting to his teasing ways... I’m all wet after cumming over and over. Daughter of a former CEO, Ayane Tachibana is now the secretary to the CEO of the Miyagase Group, Mr. Miyagase after her father falls ill and their company goes bust! She had always thought that her new boss was just plain rude, but one day he stands up for her when she messes up! When she asks him through teary eyes, why he’s being so kind to her, his response is surprising. “No one could replace you.” He then pushes her onto the sofa and proceeds to use his experienced fingers to tease and pinch her nipples and pussy... I feel like I’m going to melt...! And now everytime he sees me, my heart won’t stop pounding...!
